kw.name: Name
kw.doc: :example: 'John Doe'

kw.name: Password
kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '112'} body=b'{"nome": "Breno Ara\\u00fajo", "email": "caleb38@example.org", "password": "0KGe+uY2$1", "administrador": "true"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
